title: E4A Wisdom Artifact v1
description: A verifiable, anonymized, and transferable learning derived from a constellation's mission logs.

wisdomId.description: Unique identifier for the wisdom artifact.

learningDomain.description: The specific context of the learning (e.g., 'mandate_failure_analysis').

sourceCharterHash.description: SHA-256 hash of the originating constellation's Charter, providing cultural context.

anonymizedDataPoints.description: The number of mission log entries used to generate this learning.

wisdomPayload.description: The generalized, anonymized learning. This can be a model update, a new rule, or a proposed schema change.

attestation.description: An E4A Attestation signing this WisdomArtifact, providing proof of its origin and integrity.
